name: Racer (itch) (xrajishx)
description:
This is a prototype currently in very early stages of development. This game is being developed as a submission for The Godot 2MB Challenge

This is my first ever attempt at a 3D game, and my second ever attempt at a game in general. The source code is open source and can be found on Github.

Credits:

The car model is made by Quaternius  and can be found here
